title: Cycle
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Film festivals - United States - San Francisco - Awards
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Belief and doubt
description: A film of free-hand line animation, where the movement as much as the designs reflects the artist's thoughts on the life of humans and their universe. What evolves is a stream of ideas about the elemental situation of humankind, poised midway between the primary dust and the measureless universe yet unplumbed. A film without words; titles in French, music by Maurice Blackburn. (Award: San Francisco.)
